title: Becca & Michelle Answer Fan Questions
description:
Becca and Michelle respond to questions sent in by the fans on this week’s “Bachelor Happy Hour”! The ladies hold nothing back as they answer questions about their relationships with Thomas and Nayte, what happens behind the scenes at “The Bachelor,” this upcoming season of “Bachelor in Paradise,” and so much more.  

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode. 

Thanks to our sponsors: 

Curology: Curology.com/Bachelor 

BetterHelp: BetterHelp.com/Bachelor

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
